ingredients.item: 500g courgettes, spiralised, julienned or cut into long thin strips
1 unwaxed lemon, zested and halved, plus extra to serve
Â¼ x 25g pack mint, leaves torn

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a wide nonstick frying pan, then add the gnocchi and fry for 4 minutes, without moving them. Turn the gnocchi by scraping them up with a fish slice (some tasty crispy bits will already be starting to form), then cook for 4 minutes more, until golden, puffed and crisp. Tip into a bowl.

Add the courgettes to the pan and cook for 1 minute over a high heat until just starting to wilt. Stir in the garlic, capers, lemon zest and a squeeze of juice, if needed. Season and take off the heat.
Fold in the gnocchi, cheese and most of the mint. Dot with the ricotta. Scatter over a few more mint leaves and serve with lemon wedges for squeezing over.
